page.title: 06HEALTH A DOCTOR
page.content: {Doctor Gay}is a village doctor in St Merryn.His{practice area}covers 250 miles of North Cornwall,the land from Wadebridge to Roche , down the main road A30 to Summercourt and across to the North coast near Newquay. A{surgery}is held in St Merryn twice a week on Tuesdays and Thursday. There are 6 other doctors in the practice. Each day{Doctor Gay}works 4.5 hours in the surgery and then spends 3.5 hours doing paperwork at his house.In a week {Docter Gay}works 5 days from Monday to Friday.Sometimes Doctor Gay has a Tuesday afternoon off if he is lucky .He is on call most weekends. {Doctor Gay}sees about 30 patients a day and about{18%}of them are 65 and over.Doctor Gay sees about 11000 patients in the practice area but only sees 2500 in the survey area.
